titleStmt.title: The manner of the beheading of Duke Hambleton, the Earle of Holland, and the Lord Capell, in the pallace yard at Westminster, on Friday the 9th of March 1648 with the substance of their several speeches upon the scaffold, immediately before they were beheaded.
titleStmt.author: Sibbald, James, 1590?-1650?

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to James Sibbald.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
